---



---


Two auth systems are present: Clerk (in Layout and middleware) and Supabase (in AuthProvider). A few clarifications:

1. Which auth system should protect routes?
   - a) Clerk (already in middleware/Layout)
   - b) Supabase (used in AuthProvider/login page)
   - c) Both (hybrid)

2. Should the "coming soon" page replace the homepage or be a separate route?
   - a) Replace homepage (`/`)
   - b) Separate route (e.g., `/coming-soon`)

3. Should users be able to sign up/login from the coming soon page?
   - a) Yes, include sign up/login buttons
   - b) No, just show the message

```diff
@@ -1,5 +1,26 @@
- import { clerkMiddleware } from &quot;@clerk/nextjs/server&quot;;
- 
- export default clerkMiddleware();
+ import { clerkMiddleware, createRouteMatcher } from &quot;@clerk/nextjs/server&quot;;
+ import { NextResponse } from &quot;next/server&quot;;
+ 
+ const isPublicRoute = createRouteMatcher([
+   &quot;/coming-soon(.*)&quot;,
+   &quot;/sign-in(.*)&quot;,
+   &quot;/sign-up(.*)&quot;,
+   &quot;/api/webhooks(.*)&quot;,
+ ]);
+ 
+ export default clerkMiddleware(async (auth, req) =&gt; {
+   const { userId } = await auth();
+   const isPublic = isPublicRoute(req);
+ 
+   // If user is not authenticated and trying to access a protected route
+   if (!userId &amp;&amp; !isPublic) {
+     // Redirect to coming soon page
+     const comingSoonUrl = new URL(&quot;/coming-soon&quot;, req.url);
+     return NextResponse.redirect(comingSoonUrl);
+   }
+ 
+   // Allow the request to proceed
+   return NextResponse.next();
+ });
  
  export const config = {
```

## Summary

1. Created Coming Soon Landing Page (`app/coming-soon/page.tsx`)
   - Landing page with "Coming Soon" message
   - No sign up/login buttons
   - Uses existing styling/theme
   - Minimal layout (no navigation header)

2. Created Coming Soon Layout (`app/coming-soon/layout.tsx`)
   - Minimal layout wrapper for the coming soon page

3. Updated Middleware (`middleware.ts`)
   - Protects all routes except `/coming-soon` and Clerk auth routes (`/sign-in`, `/sign-up`, `/api/webhooks`)
   - Redirects unauthenticated users to `/coming-soon`

4. Updated Layout Component (`src/components/Layout.tsx`)
   - Skips rendering for `/coming-soon` route
   - Hides navigation items for unauthenticated users (safeguard)

All routes (including the homepage) are now protected behind Clerk authentication. Unauthenticated users are redirected to `/coming-soon`, which is publicly accessible without auth buttons.
